author: psmith
msg: moved out the definition of the root node for friendly access.

author: psmith
msg: added beginnings of right click popup menu support for each node in the
Receiver tree.  Also added Restart icon to Reciever panel toolbar
which stops and starts all the Receiver plugins in Log4j (causing a disconnect
to any Socket, but you are warned via Confirm dialog).

author: psmith
msg: refactored PopupListener to top level class.

author: psmith
msg: added Redo icon for use with restart actions.

author: sdeboy
msg: Updated code which changes each tab's icons:
- new events are currently being delivered to the tab (light bulb)
- events have been delivered to the tab since the tab was last active (info icon)
- the tab is active or no events have been delivered since last active (no icon)
Tabs are now constructed with a 'new events' icon
A listener was added to remove the icon of the active tab through the tabpane's changelistener
